title: The James Franco and the 'All the Money in the World' Controversies, Plus 'Dark' (Ep. 217)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald process some of the troubling Hollywood news from this week concerning allegations about James Franco (1:00) and the pay-scale disparity between Michelle Williams and Mark Wahlberg on the ‘All the Money in the World’ reshoots (12:00). Later, for #DarkThursdays they discuss episodes 4-6 of Netflix’s 'Dark' (21:30)

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
